alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pueblo County through 400 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Pueblo Reservoir, or 11 miles southwest of Pueblo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Pueblo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
